description: Revisions are made to a plan for Castletown amid concerns over the impact on rally stages, a minister says.
title: Castletown traffic calming plan changed amid rally concerns
title_page: Castletown traffic calming plan changed amid rally concerns - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Infrastructure (DOI) said the plans, which included seven speed bumps and two sets of speed cushions on Victoria Road, Arbory Road and the promenade, had been supported by residents during a consultation earlier in 2020.
